content: lion brand pattern # 50334 *clsu-bag pdf* skill level easy level 2 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 2 colors 122 yards each crochet hook - size i-9 split ring stitch markers one ½-inch \ 13 mm size 4 sew-on snap closure sewing needle and matching thread special stitches hdc2tog half_double_crochet decrease fpdc front post double_crochet fphdc front post half_double_crochet surface crochet as only 1 ball of each yarn is required and you will be working with 2 strands of a begin by dividing ball of a into 2 equal balls or work from inside and outside of ball design features ruffles and flower in contrast color *free registration at site required to access pattern *
